shape_1_per_frame2=y = 0.5+0.3*if(equal(instance,0),1,if(equal(instance,2),1,-1))*cos(time+0.785*instance);
shape_1_per_frame3=ang = sin(time);
shape_1_per_frame4=r = q2;
shape_1_per_frame5=g = q3;
shape_1_per_frame6=b = q1;

shape_1_per_frame8=g2 = q1;
shape_1_per_frame9=b2 = q2;
shape_1_per_frame10=rad = 0.06 + 0.03*bass_att;

shape_2_per_frame1=//ang = ang+0.2*sin(time);
shape_2_per_frame2=rad = 0.5-0.1*bass_att;
shape_2_per_frame3=
shape_2_per_frame4=x = x - 0.3*(cos(time+bass_att))*if(equal(instance,0),-1,+1);
shape_2_per_frame5=y = y + 0.3*(sin(time+bass_att))*if(equal(instance,0),-1,+1);
shapecode_3_enabled=0
shapecode_3_sides=4
shapecode_3_additive=0

shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.000
shape_3_per_frame1=//ang = ang + sin(4*time+mid_att)*if(above(sin(4*time+mid_att),0),1,-1);
per_frame_1=
per_frame_2=q1 = 0.3 + 0.3*sin((time+0.33*treb)*3.213);
per_frame_3=q2 = 0.3 + 0.3*sin((time+0.33*treb)*3.533);
per_frame_4=q3 = 0.3 + 0.3*sin((time+0.33*treb)*3.733);
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=wave_r = q2;
per_frame_7=wave_g = q3;
per_frame_8=wave_b = q1;
per_frame_9=ib_r = q1;
per_frame_10=ib_g = q2;
per_frame_11=ib_b = q3;
per_frame_12=ob_r = 1.3-q1;
per_frame_13=ob_g = 1.3-q2;
per_frame_14=ob_b = 1.3-q3;
per_frame_15=//zoom = 0.990-0.05*bass;
per_frame_16=dx = dx + 0.01*(4*sin(time+bass_att));
per_frame_17=dy = dy - 0.01*(3*cos(time+bass_att));
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`   
comp_4=`uv *=2 ;
comp_5=`float2 m = floor(frac(uv*0.5)*2);
comp_6=`uv = frac(uv)*(1-m) + (m)*frac(1-uv);
comp_7=`    uv = float2(rad,uv.y);
comp_8=`
comp_9=`
comp_10=`    float2 uv_echo = (uv.yx - 0.5)*1.000*float2(-1,1) + 0.5;
comp_11=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv.yx).xyz*+saturate(GetBlur2(uv.yx)*2.8 - 0.13); 
comp_12=`    float3 ret2 = tex2D(sampler_main, uv_echo).xyz*+saturate(GetBlur2(uv_echo)*2.8 - 0.13);
comp_13=`    ret = lerp(ret,ret2,.5);
comp_14=`    ret *= ret; //darken
comp_15=`    ret *= float3(.9,1.6,2.3);
comp_16=`    ret *= 4+bass_att; //gamma
comp_17=`    //ret *= 2;
comp_18=`    ret = pow(ret,1-ret);
comp_19=`//    ret = .5*lum(ret);
comp_20=`//    ret = max(ret3,.8*lerp(ret3,ret.zxy,.75));
comp_21=`}
